subtitles.text: Hey, hey, hey, hey, Miya, I got my bangs cut. How do you like it? Do you think it looks good?
How do you like it?

Do you have any news?
Yes, well, first of all...
On Sunday, April 23rd, at Shinjuku Lenny's
We will be doing a one-ban live performance of Crown Pop on Sunday, April 23rd at Lenny's in Shinjuku.
Thank you very much.
The details are still under construction.
We hope you will have a chance to see the improved Crowne Pop.
We will do our best to give you a chance to see the improved Crown Pop.
Please come and see us for sure!
Thank you very much.
Thank you very much.
Also, from September to December this year, we will be going on a tour called "Hashtag Clap Cute Nationwide Spread Tour".
We're going to spread the "Clap Cute" throughout the country from Hokkaido to Okinawa, so please make sure you tag us with the hashtag "Clap Cute".

And there is one more important live concert at the end of the year, on the 28th of December, Crown Pop will be performing at zepp diversity.
